title: Privacy Policy
intro: We value your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.title: 1. Information Collection
collection.content: Our watermark removal tool runs locally in your browser and does not collect, store, or transmit your uploaded images. The only information we may collect is anonymous usage statistics to improve service quality.

usage.title: 2. Information Usage
usage.content:
Anonymous statistics we collect are used only for:
• Analyzing and improving service performance
• Understanding user usage patterns
• Optimizing user experience

We will never sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information.

storage.title: 3. Data Storage
storage.content: All images you upload are processed locally in your browser and are not uploaded to our servers. After processing is complete, you can choose to download the results, and we do not retain any copies.

cookies.title: 4. Use of Cookies
cookies.content: We may use cookies to improve your browsing experience. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect certain features of the website.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party analytics services (such as Google Analytics) to help us understand website usage. These services have their own privacy policies.

security.title: 6. Security Measures
security.content: We take reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, modification, or disclosure.

changes.title: 7. Policy Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page and the "Last Updated" date will be updated.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through the contact page.
